title: Austin Park Meetup
description: Let's meet up at the Austin Park this weekend and let our furry friends run loose! Water will be provided for both humans and pets!

title: Downtown Group Dog Walking
description: Interested in going for a walk downtown while meeting new friends? Meet in front of the Austin capital!

title: Paws in the Park
description: Join us for a fun day of play at Zilker Park! We'll have frisbees, balls, and treats for all the furry attendees.

title: Yappy Hour Social
description: Bring your pup for a yappy hour social at a dog-friendly patio! Enjoy snacks and drinks while your pets make new friends.

title: Pupper Picnic
description: Pack a picnic and join us at Barton Springs Park for a relaxed day with your furry companions. Don't forget the sunscreen!

title: Playdate at Town Lake
description: Let's have a playdate by Town Lake Trail! Walk, run, or just chill with fellow pet lovers along the beautiful trail.
